label: cascading_failure_01_dx_auth_audit_025
content:

### Infrastructure
- idp-api-01: CPU 66% | Mem 78% | Disk 66% | Conns: 339 | Net: 122/130 Mbps
- idp-api-02: CPU 63% | Mem 77% | Disk 64% | Conns: 335 | Net: 119/127 Mbps
- audit-worker-01: CPU 76% | Mem 65% | Disk 49% | Conns: N/A | Net: 162/155 Mbps
- audit-db-01: CPU 47% | Mem 83% | Disk 78% | IOPS: 12000 | Replication lag: 1.1 sec

### Connection Pools
- pool-idp-api-01: active 120 | idle 30 | waiting 5 | exhaustion: 2 | max: 150 | avg_wait: 12ms
- pool-idp-api-02: active 115 | idle 25 | waiting 4 | exhaustion: 1 | max: 150 | avg_wait: 10ms
- pool-audit-worker-01: active 80 | idle 20 | waiting 3 | exhaustion: 0 | max: 100 | avg_wait: 8ms
- pool-audit-db-01: active 50 | idle 10 | waiting 2 | exhaustion: 0 | max: 60 | avg_wait: 5ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 87% | Bandwidth: 3.2 Gbps | Origin requests: 15000

### Alerts
- [SEVERE] idp-api-01: CPU 66%
- [WARNING] audit-db-01: Disk 78%
- [INFO] audit-worker-01: CPU 76%
- [SEVERE] idp-api-02: CPU 63%
- [WARNING] audit-db-01: Replication lag 1.1 sec

### Deployments & Changes
- RBAC policy updates: 8 policies modified, 228 roles granted, 184 roles revoked, 82 permission change requests approved with SLA median 66 min.
- Evidence export: 12 PDFs and 30 CSVs exported; no failures.
- Directory sync: 24 runs, 2140 objects updated, 18 objects deleted, no failures, avg duration 89 sec.
- Helpdesk: 392 access requests, 242 password resets, 70 MFA resets, median first response 24 min.
- Admin approvals: 78 pending, 4 auto-approved, 14 rejected, avg approval time 73 min.
- Ongoing audit walkthrough: demonstrated RBAC approval workflow, exported evidence pack, documented timeline.
- Exception handling: one exception opened and closed after urgent admin access, documented timeline.
- Helpdesk surge: MFA resets ongoing, approvals verified, second reviewer added for privileged users.
- Evidence ingestion: lag increased during exports, scaled workers temporarily, confirmed p95 near 11 sec.

### Events
- Auditor walkthrough: demonstrated RBAC approval workflow and exported evidence pack (12 PDFs, 30 CSVs) to GRC vault.
- Opened and closed one exception after urgent admin access request gained late co-approval; documented timeline.
- Helpdesk MFA reset surge continued; verified approvals and added second reviewer requirement for privileged users.
- Audit ingest lag increased during evidence exports; temporarily scaled workers and confirmed p95 returned near 11s.

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: J. Osei. 3 pages. 17 tickets. Status: Busy; walkthrough completed and temporary scaling applied.
